pr_title: SAK-43634 - SWITCH: Announcement : Use permissions widget

timeline.message:
SAK-43634

- Moved properties files from tool to api.
- Merged permissions.properties files into announcement.properties.
- Adapted to permissions webcomponent
- Modified permissions webcomponent to allow bundlekey.

timeline.bodyText: Small thing, but I'd prefer you stick to the pattern used elsewhere of using hyphen to separate words, so bundle-key. You'll need to update the property in the component to be bundleKey: {attribute: "bundle-key", type: String}.
timeline.author: adrianfish
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -4,4 +4,4 @@ - \ No newline at end of file +

replies.bodyText: I do like the bundle key change. Nice.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: Changes done. Thanks for the suggestion
replies.author: frasese

timeline.bodyText: This will end up as bundleKey: {attribute: "bundle-key", type: String} if you use hyphenated attribute names
timeline.author: adrianfish
